name: YOU DID A BAD THING NYK! 2: HELL CITY
name_original: YOU DID A BAD THING NYK! 2: HELL CITY
description:
Guide our Dog girl continues in her journey to escape the underworld!
Featuring a new colorful locale: HELL CITY! The place where sinners hang out and party 25/8!

Can all Dogs Go to Heaven? 
FIND OUT IN : YOU DID A BAD THING NYK! 2: HELL CITY!

Features:

-Retro 2D Platforming!

-66 Collectables!

-Graphics/Music/Writing by nykTV!

-9 MORE 'NES-HARD' Levels of HELL (CITY)!

-New Characters!

-A Hidden Banana?

-& more!

Developed in Pocket Platformer by the_l0bster : https://the-l0bster.itch.io/pocket-platformer (Not actually a legit NES game, Sorry!)

(!Let us know what you think! WE LOVE FEEDBACK!)

((CHROME IS THE RECOMMENDED BROWSER FOR PLAYING THIS GAME/OTHER BROWSERS MAY EXPERIENCE SLOWDOWN))

-

Thank you for playing, from all of us at nykTV!
